jade.util.datatype
Class MutableCoordinate

java.lang.Object
  jade.util.datatype.Coordinate
      jade.util.datatype.MutableCoordinate

public class MutableCoordinate
extends Coordinate

A mutable version of Coordinate. One potential use is allowing multiple references to the same MutableCoordinate to all be simultaneously updated.
